sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>boat</radical> holds your <radical>weapon</radical> like a <radical>plate</radical>. So in a way, it's just a <kanji>tray</kanji> for your weapon.
meaningInfo: A big boat shaped like a plate is just a tray. You keep your weapons on it, nice and flat.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, this boat <kanji>tray</kanji> is so huge, it's gotten you <reading>ban</reading>ned (<ja>ばん</ja>) from the Small Boat Tray Association. Those pesky small boat tray enthusiasts...
readingInfo: Your ban from the Small Boat Tray Association has led to a massive feud between large boat tray enthusiasts and small boat tray enthusiasts, and it seems like it'll never end—leading to bans all over the place. If only we could all come together as enthusiasts of boat trays of all sizes...
